import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Table, Grid, Button, Menu, Input, Header, Icon, Dimmer, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import JobAdvertisementService from '../services/JobAdvertisementService' export default function Dashboard() { const [jobAdvertisements, setjobAdvertisements] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let jobAdvertisementService = new JobAdvertisementService() jobAdvertisementService.findByIsActive().then(result => setjobAdvertisements(result.data.data)) }, []) return (
Pozisyon Şehir Şirket Yayınlanma Tarihi Son Başvuru Tarihi { jobAdvertisements.map((jobAdvertisement) => ( {jobAdvertisement.jobTitleTitle} {jobAdvertisement.cityCityName} {jobAdvertisement.employerCompanyName} {jobAdvertisement.creatingDate} {jobAdvertisement.endingDate} )) }
İŞVEREN VE ÇALIŞANI BULUŞTURAN PLATFORM
) }
